text.name:
A nutritious and long-lasted can of baked beans that will last two to five years depending on storage conditions.
Food: +30 Water: +5

A can of tuna. If unopened, it will last two to five years depending on storage conditions.
Food: +20

A can of bacon. Smoke flavor added! Fully cooked! Delicious. Unopened, it lasts over 10 years.
Food: +35

A bag of long-grained rice, usually consumed when cooked with water. Conveniently packed for easier preparation.
Food: +65

A tomato. If we leave the fruit-vegetable debate aside, it is still tasty and edible, either raw, or cooked.
Food: +15 Water: +5 Max Stack: 3 Ingredient for: Eggs Scramble w/tomatoes Can be planted with a pickaxe, pitchfork or shovel

An ordinary ripe apple. It is still firm, delicious, and worm-free.
Food: +15 Water: +5 Max Stack: 3

A fresh banana, rich in pottasium.
Food: +15 Water: +5 Max Stack: 3

A comparatively unhealthy, [cola flavoured] beverage, alternative to water - containing carbonated water, sweeteners, flavouring agents, colouring agents and preservatives.
Water: +30

A comparatively unhealthy, [lemon-lime flavoured] beverage, alternative to water - containing carbonated water, sweeteners, flavouring agents, colouring agents and preservatives.
Water: +30

A healthy, [fermented] beverage made from rye bread, tasty and delicious.
Water: +50

5.56x45mm NATO intermediate cartridge. Used in select rifles and LMGs.
Chambered in: M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, AUG A1, FAMAS F1, Mini-14
Max Stack: 50

.45 ACP pistol cartridge. Used in select pistols and SMGs.
Chambered in: FNX 45, Colt 1911, Mini-UZI, UMP-45, KRISS Vector
Max Stack: 60

7.62x54mmR full power cartridge. Used in select rifles and LMGs.
Chambered in: Mosin-Nagant, Sawn-off Mosin, SVD Dragunov, SV-98
Max Stack: 40

7.62x39mm intermediate cartridge. Used in select rifles and LMGs.
Chambered in: SKS, AKM, RPK
Max Stack: 50

5.45x39mm intermediate cartridge. Used in select rifles.
Chambered in: AKs-74U, AK-74, AN-94
Max Stack: 50

.357 M revolver cartridge. Used in select pistols, revolvers, and rifles.
Chambered in: Magnum Revolver, Desert Eagle, Mare's Leg, M92 Repeater
Max Stack: 50

12 Gauge buck shell with 5 pellets. Used in shotguns.
Chambered in: IZh-43, Sawn-off IZh-43, Remington 870, Saiga-12K
Max Stack: 30

A roll of sterile gauze bandage. Can be used to directly stop the bleeding.
Apply Time: 2 sec Max Stack: 3

A bag of whole blood [O‚àí] with an IV set ready for transfusion. Single use to replace blood lost due to bleeding.
Health: +50 Vitality: +50 Apply Time: 6 sec

Provides a small radius of bright red light for a brief time. Can be thrown to light up an area and attract zombies when it burns.
Effect Duration: 90 sec Max Stack: 5 Ingredient for: Molotov Cocktail

Fragmentation grenade type used by the Russian forces. It is lethal in small radius, but can cause serious injuries at medium ranges.
Damage: 1800 Damage per Frag: 75 Fuse time Àê 2 sec Frags: 24
A common 9V battery, used to power various electronic devices.
After deploying, can be used upto 3 times, passively lasts for 3 minutes.

A box of long kitchen safety matches to light a flame on demand. Store in dry place and keep away from children.
Can light a campfire kit or cigarettes.

"I've drunk whiskey, I feel healthy"
Water: +20 Heat:: +40 Ingredient for: Molotov Cocktail

An assortment of torn rags, still... can be used to stop bleeding.
Apply Time: 5 sec Max Stack: 3 Ingredient for: Campfire Kit, Rope

Cranberries can be collected from the berry bushes found throughout the forests, they can be distinguished easily by their red, ripe and juicy berries.
Food: +15 Water: +15 Max Stack: 5

A bag of saline solution with an IV set ready for transfusion. Used to replace some blood lost due to bleeding.
Health: +25 Vitality: +25 Apply Time: 6 sec

Multi-Vitamin supplements helps in boosting blood to recover health twice as fast.
Vitality: +10 Health Regen: x2 Effect Duration: 60 sec Max Stack: 3

A comparatively unhealthy, [cola flavoured] beverage, alternative to water - containing carbonated water, sweeteners, flavouring agents, colouring agents and preservatives.
Water: +30

This zucchini is just ripe enough to be eaten raw.
Food: +20 Water: +20
Can be planted with a pickaxe, pitchfork or shovel

Bell pepper, green variety. Not so spicy and has plenty of nutrients and vitamins, can be used for cooking or eaten raw.
Food: +20 Water: +5 Max Stack: 3 Ingredient for: Stir-fried Meat w/Bell Peppers Can be planted with a pickaxe, pitchfork or shovel

A popular citrus fruit, packed with vitamin "C".
Food: +15 Water: +15 Max Stack: 3

Small disposable heat source, keeps you warm for a limited time when put into a jacket, pants or vest.
Heat:: +25
A pocket-sized universal sewing kit, comes handy for patching various clothes.

A wooden box containing a complete and universal gun-care system.
Can restore 25% durability to firearms.

A firm but flexible long wooden branch from the native ashwood trees.
Ingredient for: Simple Fishing Rod, Improvised Bow

Multipurpose pieces of wood. Ideal for making arrows, kindling, and barricades. Drops from the native ashwood trees.
Max Stack: 5 Ingredient for: Campfire Kit, Crafted arrows, Improvised Backpack, Wooden Barricade

A versatile, strong and flexible wide adhesive tape. If it moves and shouldn't, use duct tape.
Can repair 15% durability of clothes. Can repair the boat on the second island Ingredient for: Improvised suppressor

Burlap sack is ideal for shipping and storing stuff. a drawstring closure can be improvised at the top of the bag using a rope.
Ingredient for: Improvised Sling Bag, Canvas

Strong rope, used to tie stuff together, be it things or people.
Can be used to carry a melee weapon on your back, tap the empty hand slot to unequip the weapon. Ingredient for: Improvised Sling Bag, Improvised Bow, Simple Fishing Rod

The hunting knife is a specialized tool designed with a slightly curved tip, primarily for field dressing game.
Damage: 14-24 Crit Chance: 10% Block Chance: 5% Delay per Attk: 0.8s

Sharp combat knife with a sturdy blade and a handle. Great for self-defense, but it has other, more mundane uses as well.
Damage: 15-25 Crit Chance: 15% Block Chance: 5% Delay per Attk: 0.8s

A big, heavy, rusted knife. Designed to slash through thick raw meat. It can also crack bones easily. Mostly used by butchers.
Damage: 16-26 Crit Chance: 20% Block Chance: 5% Delay per Attk: 0.8s

Morphine, prepares your body for "fight or flight" situations by increasing heart rate, blood flow, and alertness.
Drug Effect: Health bar is restored to full and movement speed is increased by 15%, but after 20 sec health drops to 20 Max Stack: 3

Broad spectrum antibiotics. Used to treat viral and bacterial infectious diseases and prevents sickness.
Vitality: +10 Drug Effect: Cures and prevents sickness and poisoning for the effect duration Effect Duration: 60 sec Max Stack: 3

The text on the pack says: "A useful variety for outdoor cultivation in even the wet summers! Grow these vigorous, indeterminate plants to produce heavy crops of deep red fruits with a very good flavour".
Uses: 5
Can be planted with a pickaxe, pitchfork, or shovel

The text on the pack says: "A large bell pepper and a great variety for classic bell pepper taste. Bears large fruits with a blocky shape. Usually eaten while green, fruits have a sweet flavour and crunchy texture".
Uses: 5
Can be planted with a pickaxe, pitchfork, or shovel

Everyday newspapers found in homes before the apocalypse, still they contain useful crafts, guides and articles about survival and can be read to gain some experience.
Experience: +50
Ingredient for: Campfire kit

Its wood, the basic survival material. Can be obtained by chopping up a tree using axes or bladed weapons.
Can repair the boat to the second island.
Ingredient for: Campfire kit, Wooden Barricade, Item stash

Wooden sticks carved using knifes into finely matched arrows, but they are flimsy.
Damage: 37-63 Max Stack: 10 75% chance to break after firing. Can be loaded into: Improvised Bow, Hunting Crossbow

Modern aluminium core composite bolts with high impact.
Damage: 56-94 Max Stack: 10 Will not break after firing. Can be loaded into: Improvised Bow, Hunting Crossbow

A metal canister, filled with large volumes of gasoline.
Uses: 4
Provides 25% fuel for vehicles and chainsaw per use Provides fuel for the boat on the third island

A commom reusable plastic bottle. Can be filled with water from water pumps.
Water: +12 Uses: 4 Can be filled with water from a pump Can collect rainwater when left on the ground while raining Ingredient for: Improvised suppressor

A reusable military grade plastic bottle used by the army and campers. Can be filled with water from water pumps.
Water: +25 Uses: 4 Can be filled with water from a pump

Anti-personnel mine. Provides a nasty surprise for anybody unlucky enough to step on it.
Damage: 1800 Damage per Frag: 75 Frags: 24 Explodes when triggered by entities other than you and your teammates.

Old-fashioned but functional, this marvel of mechanical engineering can almost snap your leg in half.
Damage: 200 Can be reused again Not triggered by player

.22 Long rifle rimfire cartridge. Used in small pistols and rifles.
Chambered in: Ruger 10/22 Sporter, Amphibia S
Max Stack: 80

Toolkit containing mechanical tools that can be used for reparing and restoring damaged vehicles.
Can repair 25% durability of vehicles.

A raw chunk of meat from a deer. Tougher, darker meat, it can be quite tasty, once prepared.
Food: +25 Water: +10 50% chance of getting sick after consumption Can be cooked over a campfire Ingredient for: Stir-fried Meat w/Bell Peppers

Raw venison steak roasted over a campfire to succulent perfection.
Food: +50 Water: +10 Health: +15

A bottle of Nuka-Cola, the flavored softdrink of the post-nuclear world. Warm and flat. Invigorating, refreshing Nukem
Water: +100 Experience: +200 Health Regen: x2 Effect Duration: 60 sec

A straightforward option for a bolt of athletic energy, it combines caffeine, vitamins, and a familiar Mountain Dew taste.
Water: +20 Movement speed: +15% Effect Duration: 20 sec

The text on the pack says: "This is our most popular zucchini. An early, very productive, bushy plant with an open habit. The flesh is delicious, creamy white, tender and firm".
Uses: 5
Can be planted with a pickaxe, pitchfork or shovel

9x19mm parabellum pistol cartridge. Used in select pistols and SMGs.
Chambered in: Glock 17, MP5K, MAC-10
Max Stack: 60

A roll of gnarly barbed wire made for fencing off walls and barriers.
Ingredient for: Barbed Baseball Bat

The posterior leg of a rabbit. When cooked provides quite a tasty snack.
Food: +25 Water: +10 Ingredient for: Stir-fried Meat w/Bell Peppers 50% chance of getting sick after consumption Can be cooked over a campfire

Rabbit leg roasted over a campfire, tender and flavourful.
Food: +35 Water: +10 Health: +30

Cloud berries can only be found around lakes. Although very healthy this unusual berry gives off a musky odor.
Food: +10 Water: +10 Health Regen: x2 Effect Duration: 30 sec Max Stack: 5

Bilberries can be collected from the berry bushes found throughout the forests. These berries are so juicy with the highest water content compared to other berries.
Food: +10 Water: +20 Max Stack: 5

A device, such as a walkie-talkie, that transmits or receives radio signals. Its current set frequency picks up the faint radio signals of crashed military tansports.
Uses: 10 Has 12.5% chance to locate an underground bunker

A standardized rail-mounted, non-magnifying optic with a red dot projected onto the lens.
Headshot Chance: +5% Spread: -2 Can be installed on: MP5K, UMP-45,KRISS Vector, AKs-74U, AK-74, AN-94, AKM, M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, FN-FAL, RPK, Saiga-12K, PP-19 Bizon, OTs-14 Groza, VSS Vintorez, SV-98, Mini-14

3.5x scope of Soviet manufacture from WW2 era.
Headshot Chance: +15% Spread: -4 Can be installed on: SKS, Mosin-Nagant, M70, Blaze

Marksman telescopic sight with fixed 4x magnification and ballistic compensation in range from 100m to 1000m.
Headshot Chance: +15% Spread: -4 Can be installed on: AKs-74U, AK-74, AN-94, AKM, RPK, PP-19 Bizon, OTs-14 Groza, VSS Vintorez

Advanced Combat Optical Gunsight with 4x magnification level. Attachable to any weapon with a standardized rail system.
Headshot Chance: +15% Spread: -4 Can be installed on: MP5K, UMP-45, KRISS Vector, M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, FN-FAL, SV-98, Mini-14
Attachment for the barrel of a firearm, reduces the amount of noise generated by firing. This variant is designed for the 5.45mm caliber. Can be installed on: AKs-74U, AN-94, AK-74
Attachment for the barrel of a firearm, reduces the amount of noise generated by firing. This variant is designed for the 5.56mm caliber. Can be installed on: M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, AUG A1

A fine-tooth hand saw with a blade held under tension in a frame, used for cutting materials such as metal or plastics.
Sawable: M92 Repeater, IZh-43, Blaze, Mosin Nagant

Attached on the rifle stock ,bandolier is designed to keep ammunition readily available during hunting and combat.
Reload speed: +30%
Can be installed on: IZh-43, Remington 870, SKS, Mosin-Nagant, M92 Repeater, M70, Blaze

Meal Ready-to-Eat [MRE], is a self-contained, individual field ration intended for use by the military.These rations are designed to provide a complete, balanced meal for one person.
Food: +40 Water: +40 Uses: 2

An extendable fishing rod. Highly portable, it makes fishing seem simple.
Uses: 10

A piece of rope tied to a stick. This marvelous invention can be surprisingly useful, but its very flimsy.
Uses: 4

A lost yellow case sealed with loot, belongs to the group of neutral survivors.
Contains lost items of a neutral survivors group. Can be returned to them for goodwill or opened for loot at the cost of karma

Attached at the end of a magazine, it makes easy work to swap magazines from pouches, pockets or bags.
Reload speed: +30%
Can be installed on: AKs-74U, AK-74, AN-94, AKM, M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, FN-FAL, AUG A1, RPK, Saiga-12K, OTs-14 Groza, VSS Vintorez, FAMAS F1, Mini-14

The choke constricts the muzzle end of the barrel to alter the shot into a concentrated pattern.
Reduces the spread of shotgun pellets. Can be installed on: IZh-43, Remington 870, Saiga-12K

Herring, small, silvery, forage fish known for its streamlined bodies and iridescent scales.
Food: +10 Water: +10 50% chance of getting sick after consumption Can be cooked over a campfire

Salmon, A diverse group of fish known for its migratory patterns, moving between freshwater and saltwater habitats.
Food: +35 Water: +15 50% chance of getting sick after consumption Can be cooked over a campfire

Ruffe, A small freshwater fish, typically around 4-6 inches long, with a slender, elongated body.
Food: +10 Water: +10 50% chance of getting sick after consumption Can be cooked over a campfire

Perch are known for having two dorsal fins, one spiny and one soft, and are typically carnivorous bottom-dwellers.
Food: +35 Water: +15 50% chance of getting sick after consumption Can be cooked over a campfire

Small fish filet roasted over a campfire for a tasty, decent sized snack.
Food: +25 Water: +10 Health: +10

Prepared fish filet seered over the campfire, It's fully-cooked, flaky, tender and filling.
Food: +50 Water: +10 Health: +10

Headshot Chance: +25% Spread: -6 Can be installed on: SKS, Mosin-Nagant, SVD Dragunov, SV-98, M70, Blaze, Mini-14, FN-FAL

Directional explosive mine. A convenient label reminds the user to point it toward the enemy.
Damage: 1575 Damage per Frag: 75 Frags: 21 Explodes and fires fragments in a specified direction, when triggered by entities other than you and your teammates.

9x18mm Makarov pistol round. Used in select pistol and SMGs.
Chambered in: PM, PB, PP-19 Bizon
Max Stack: 60

9x39mm intermediate subsonic cartridge. Used in select rifles.
Chambered in: VSS Vintorez, OTs-14 Groza
Max Stack: 50
An incendiary molotov cocktail, improvised by attaching a flare to a bottle of good whiskey, It surprisingly does the job.

A single use flare gun loaded with a flare cartridge When fired, it signals for an air drop supply crate of random tier.
Can attract nearby zombies

The specific type of .50 caliber ammunition and its availability in belt-fed configurations can be very based, for the application of gun turrets.
Ammo used in the humvee's gun turret

Charges for M203 under-barrel grenade launcher. Explodes on impact.
Damage: 540 Damage per Frag: 45 Frags: 12 Max Stack: 10

Charges for GP-25 under-barrel grenade launcher. Explodes on impact.
Damage: 540 Damage per Frag: 45 Frags: 12 Max Stack: 10 Ingredient for: VOG-25 Khatabka

The M203 is a single-shot 40 mm ,muzzle loaded, under-barrel grenade launcher designed to attach to a rifle. Its Western-style. Can load and fire 40mm grenades Can be installed on: M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, FN-FAL, FAMAS F1
The GP-25 belongs to the family of Russian grenade launchers that fits on AK assault rifles, muzzle loaded. Can load and fire VOG-25 grenades Can be installed on: AK-74, AKM, AN-94
IV set along with an sterile blood bag, can be used to draw your own blood for a single use in future. Turns into a blood bag after transfusion
The whetstone can be used to sharpen the edges of various bladed weapons and tools. Can restore 25% durability to some melee weapons

Universal tactical forend for AK series weapons.
Greatly reduces recoil when firing Can be installed on: AK-74, AKM, RPK Ingredient for: Laser AK Grip

Foregrip for firearms with picatinny rails.
Greatly reduces recoil when firing Can be installed on: UMP-45, M4A1, L85A2, KRISS Vector Ingredient for: Laser Rail Grip

A map with some markings,contains notes about interesting places, checkpoints, POIs and vehicles on the current island.
If not used on this island, will disappear from the inventory on the next island

Elderberries are small, dark purple colored black berries, known for their fragrant creamy flavour and rich nutrients. They grow only in swamps.
Food: +10 Water: +10 Health: +2 Max Stack: 5

The scout handbook provides a comprehensive guide for scouting activities, covering areas like camping, survival skills, first aid, and leadership.
Experience: +200

Burlap sacks rolled into a roll for later use.
Ingredient for: Item stash

A type of medical tape with adhesive properties, Can be used to directly stop the bleeding in an instant.
Apply Time: 1 second Max Stack: 5
Smoke grenade used by western forces. The smoke is colorless, it can provide complete cover againts enemies.

"Russian cigarettes" filled with a high-nicotine, potent tobacco called makhorka and were popular throughout the Soviet era.
Heat:: +5 Drug Effect: stops hunger and thirst while the effect is active Effect Duration: 30 sec Max Stack: 10 Gain +5 Karama If you gift it to a survivor

Beer cans usually last for 6-9 months at room temperature, the taste is a little off, but is still refreshingly sweet.
Water: +20 Heat:: +10

Epoxy glue is a strong, two-part adhesive made from epoxy resin and a hardener.
Repair: +25%

Composed of plant matter and animal wastes, is rich in essential nutrients that plants love.
Increases the growth rate of plants

laser sights project a laser beam onto a target, aiding in aiming speed and recoil recovery.
Aiming speed and recoil recovery speed +30% Can be installed on: UMP-45, KRISS Vector, AKs-74U, AK-74, AN-94, AKM, M4A1, L85A2, RPK, Mosin-Nagant, SKS, SVD Dragunov, SV-98, VSS Vintorez, M70, Saiga-12K, Blaze, Mini-14 Ingredient for: Laser AK Grip, Laser Rail Grip

The Lighter creates a flame using a mechanical ignition system, powered by a flint and wheel mechanism.
Uses: 100 Can light a campfire kit or light cigarettes.

An officer's keycard. A critical key for managing access to sensitive areas, authorised gear and maintaining security within a military facility.
Can unlock special doors in underground bunkers. Only works for bunkers on the current island

A homemade DIY suppressor that can reduce some firearm noise. It just works.
Can be installed on: M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, AUG A1, FN-FAL, AKs-74U, AN-94, AK-74, AKM, FAMAS F1, Mini-14

A standardized rail-mounted 3.5x magnifier with night vision, made for NATO firearms.
Headshot rate +15% Spread -4 Can be installed on: MP5K, UMP-45, KRISS Vector, M4A1, M16A2, L85A2, FN-FAL, SV-98, Mini-14

A side-mounted 3.5x magnifier with night vision, suitable for Warsaw Pact firearms.
Headshot rate +15% Spread -4 Can be installed on: AKs-74U, AK-74, AN-94, AKM, RPK, PP-19 Bizon, OTs-14 Groza, VSS Vintorez, Saiga-12K

A 100-round 5.56x45 dual drum Mag.
Can be installed on: M4A1, M16A2, AUG A1

A 75-round 7.62x39 drum Mag.
Can be installed on: AKM, RPK

Can Cook: Fried Eggs, Eggs Scramble w/Tomatoes, Stir-Fried Meat w/Bell Peppers

A form of personal protective equipment (PPE) that protects the wearer from inhaling airborne pollutants and toxic gases.
Heat: +2 Provides immunity against toxic gas contaminated areas, durability wears constantly in contaminated areas Can be wore as a liner to wear other head gear on top of it Click the empty head slot to unequip it when used as a liner

A close-fitting head covering that protects the head, face and neck, leaving only the eyes or parts of the face exposed.
Heat:: +3 Can be wore as a liner to wear other head gear on top of it Click the empty head slot to unequip it when used as a liner

Full face soviet gas mask with frontal mount for filter cartridges. Used to protect from airborne pollutants and contaminated air.
Heat:: +2 Provides immunity against toxic gas contaminated areas, has more durability but wears constantly in contaminated areas Can be wore as a liner to wear other head gear on top of it Click the empty head slot to unequip it when used as a liner

The headgear of choice of the clownin around degenerate island thugs.
Heat:: +1 Can be wore as a liner to wear other head gear on top of it Click the empty head slot to unequip it when used as a liner
"welcome to minidayz+"

.308 Winchester full power cartridge. Used in select rifles.
Chambered in: M70, FN-FAL, Blaze, Sawn-Off Blaze, Longhorn
Max Stack: 40

A pair of ordinary sneakers.
Movement Speed: +5% May get damaged when stepping on acid

Woodland boots designed for wet environments.
Movement Speed: +5% Ignores swamp slowdown penalty May get damaged when stepping on acid

Designed for soldiers in combat.
Movement Speed: +10% Ignores swamp slowdown penalty An army knife can be stored May get damaged when stepping on acid
Can carry an extra primary weapon on your back. Click the empty weapon slot to unequip
Activated charcoal tablets that can filter out toxins. Can replenish 50% durability of a gas mask
Can weld 25% durability of vehicles or metallic equipment. Can reinforce a vehicle with metal plates Ingredient for: Reinforced vehicle II

Camouflage suit used to completely conceal the wearer in a natural environment.
Provides a stealth state when durability is ‚â• 50%, In this state nearby enemies can't spot you Continuous movement and attacking will remove the stealth

Mounted underbarrel flashlight for primary weapons, provides illumination at night.
Can be installed on: UMP-45, KRISS Vector, AKs-74U, AK-74, AN-94, AKM, M4A1, L85A2, AUG A1, RPK, Mosin-Nagant, SKS, SVD Dragunov, SV-98, VSS Vintorez, M70, Saiga-12K, Blaze, Mini-14

Can be installed on: AK-74, AKM, RPK

Can be installed on: UMP-45, KRISS Vector, M4A1, L85A2

"God created men, Colt made them equal" Damage: 18-30 Spread: 20-6 Aim Speed: 4 Recoil: 10 Movement Penalty: 2 Ammo: .45 ACP Mag Capacity: 7
Six shot double-action revolver, it can deliver exceptional damage. Damage: 34-56 Spread: 20-6 Aim Speed: 2 Recoil: 15 Movement Penalty: 3 Ammo: .357 Mag Capacity: 6
Affordable, reliable and compact, it's very popular in the U.S. Damage: 15-25 Spread: 20-5 Aim Speed: 4 Recoil: 10 Movement Penalty: 2 Ammo: 9x19 Mag Capacity: 18

Sawed-off double-barreled break-action shotgun. Damage: 22-188 Spread: 30-13 Aim Speed: 3 Recoil: 20 Movement Penalty: 2 Ammo: 12 Cal Mag Capacity: 2
Sawed-off five shot bolt-action rifle, fed from internal magazine. Damage: 67-113 Spread: 25-12 Aim Speed: 3 Recoil: 25 Movement Penalty: 1 Ammo: 7.62x54R Mag Capacity: 5
This variant of colt has been meticulously engraved. Damage: 18-30 Spread: 20-5 Aim Speed: 4 Recoil: 10 Movement Penalty: 2 Ammo: .45 ACP Mag Capacity: 12
The Military Armament Corporation model 10 or MAC-10. A compact submachine gun. Damage: 15-25 Spread: 20-10 Aim Speed: 3 Recoil: 2 Movement Penalty: 0 Fire Rate: 650 RPM Ammo: 9x19 Mag Capacity: 30
